text: Daniel Eduardo Bocanegra Ortiz (born 23 April 1987), is a Colombian footballer who plays as a midfielder or rightback for Club Libertad in the Paraguayan Primera División. == International == On 9 November 2014, Bocanegra received his first call-up to the Colombia national team for friendlies against the United States and Slovenia. He made his debut 18 November 2014, coming on for Santiago Arias in the 65th minute in a 1–0 victory over Slovenia. After more than a year from his last call-up, Bocanegra was included in manager José Pékerman's list to face Paraguay and Uruguay for the 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifiers on 7 and 11 October 2016, respectively. ==Statistics== ===Club performance=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=2 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Other ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
